title: 5.11 Tactical Men's TDU Short Sleeve Polo Shirt, Breathable Fabric, Teflon Finish, Style 71339
features: HIGH-QUALITY CONSTRUCTION - Made from 4.4-oz., ripstop fabric material, providing a durable, breathable, and lightweight shirt for optimum comfort

PROFESSIONALLY DESIGNED - Engineered with Teflon finish, making it stain, soil, and liquid resistant to provide enhanced reliability for a more functional and thoroughly professional polo shirt with lasting comfort

SHORT SLEEVES - Tailored with short sleeves that offer ample coverage for the arms without hindering movement. Developed with 5.11 Ready Pocket on the chest for storing documents, a phone, or any other personal items

TACTICAL POLO SHIRT - Developed to meet dress code and functionality requirements with a bi-swing shoulder for a wider range of motion and a triple-stitching. This polo shirt will surely ensure long-lasting quality and durability

MODERN FASHION - Each shirt is carefully crafted as a quick and agile alternative to aging BDU product lines, offering a stronger frame and lighter materials for superior performance that won't slow you down
description: You asked for it, and we built it. Now available after multiple requests from 5.11 shoppers, the taclite short sleeve TDU shirt is a quick and agile alternative to aging BDU product lines, offering a stronger frame and lighter materials for superior performance that won't slow you down. Crafted from our world famous taclite poly/cotton ripstop fabric, the short sleeve taclite TDU shirt combines rugged durability and rip resistance with a Teflon fabric treatment that repels stains, soil, and moisture. Our patented hidden document pockets at the chest offer plenty of covert storage space, bi-swing shoulders ensure full freedom of movement, and multiple bartacks at high stress locations ensure that the taclite TDU shirt stands up to the most demanding Tactical environments, Fabric: Polyester 65%/Cotton 35%.
